resources.string: Touch the words to get a closer look.
Database saved in the folder Fillit_tionary
I\'ve just learned a new word! It\'s
Now it\'s in my Fillit-tionary. I will never forget it!
Write the name of the DB
File not found. Check the DB name!
Error: some words could not be imported.
How will you call your file?
Add: add a new word to your dictionary
Search: look for the word you want to see. You can write either the original word or the translation
Export: save your list of words so that you never lose your work. It\'s saved in the app\'s folder in your SD card , Fillit_tionary.

Import: you can add lists of words contained in a .csv file. This way you can import your previous lists of words, some friend\'s lists, or what you have been previously working in from your computer. Just make sure you keep that file in the app\'s folder in your SD card, and that it is four columns wide.
Sort: sort your list of words according to the first field in each entry, the field Type. After sorting the list will come back to its original order.
Send: send your whole list of words in an email. To your friends, or to yourself. Fast way to also have it in your computer or other devices.
Edit: edit the words you have previously added.

Share: you can share a word in social networks, apps for chating, or wherever you want. Tell the world you are working hard to learn a new language. Share with your friends the new words you learn. Ask for ideas, examples or explanations.

Now you have a list of words for each language you\'re studying, and it appears right when you start the app. You only have to push the language to enter the list of words in that language.
In order to add a new language you have to add a new word, and write the language it belongs to in the right field. From that moment on that language will appear with the others and you\'ll only have to fill it with words!.
Are you ready for the quiz?
The results of your quiz in
Do you want to take the quiz again?
Do you want to see all your results?
How many words do you want to guess?
I just took a quiz with #Fillit-tionary in

Take a quiz to check how many of the words in your list you remenber. If the list is bigger than 10 words you can chose how many of them you want to be asked. If you want you can ask for a clue, and you\'ll see the extra information you added to your word. Later, in the results page, you\'ll see how you made it, and you can check which words you failed.
Record and play the pronunciation of the words you write on your list.
You have to write the language\'s name
One of the words had no language. It\'s been erased.
You must allow permission record audio to your mobile device.
